page.title: 16Manuden House
page.content: There was no damage done in the wars except a crack in the window and the chimneys were cracked. I think Manuden is a lovely place to live I have been here for 57 years and I moved in 1928. I don't know, but I think it was built in Queen Annes time or before. The village has changed with more houses being built and more people have come. Before there were only farms and a few cottages. The people worked in shop, forge and bakerey. I have got a dog,two donkeys, over the road are my daughters,I used to have horses which we used for hunting. No, I had no job but to look after the family. I would not move because I love the house too much. I have no unique things but very lovely things. I do not have many visitors but when I get them I enjoy it.
